[Page Title: The King Claw | Juicy Seafood & Bar]

Home
Main content starts here, tab to start navigating 
ORDER ONLINE,
PICK UP FAST 
Get your boil the way you like it. Ready when you are.
ORDER ONLINE VIEW MENU 
*Online availability varies by location.

LUNCH SPECIALS
STARTING AT $9 
Monday to Friday, 12 to 3pm. Fried baskets, po’ boys, and select seafood boil options.
 Available at all locations.
MAKE A RESERVATION FIND A LOCATION 
*Restrictions apply. Menu items and availability may vary by location.

DINNER SPECIALS & FAVORITES

Seafood boils, fried baskets, and classic favorites. Something for everyone.
MAKE A RESERVATION FIND A LOCATION 
*Selection and availability may vary by location.

GIFT CARD
DEAL 
Buy a gift card and get for free.
 Limited time offer.
$100 $15 bonus cards SHOP GIFT CARDS VIEW DETAILS 
*Available 1/1/2026 – 2/28/2026. Bonus cards delivered by email. Cannot be redeemed day of purchase. Restrictions apply.

CATERING COMING 2026

Big events, office lunches, and family gatherings. King Claw catering is on the way.
FIND A LOCATION 
*Catering services launching in select markets in 2026.
Pause 
More Seafood. More Rewards.

Join The King Claw Rewards and earn points every time you feast — online or in-store.
 Redeem for discounts, freebies, and exclusive member perks.

Earn you spend
1 point for every $1 
every year
Birthday reward 
+ member-only offers
Exclusive deals 
to Order Now + Rewards
Quick access 
with updates + specials
Stay connected Sign Up Now! Learn More *Terms & conditions apply 
THE KING CLAW APP IS HERE

Order faster, earn rewards, and unlock exclusive deals — all in one place.

Order ahead for pickup or delivery

Earn points with every purchase

Redeem rewards directly in the app

Access app-only offers & promotions

Buy and send anytime
eGift Cards Download Now 
Free to download • iOS & Android

Find Your Nearest Location

View addresses, hours, and directions for every King Claw location.
VIEW ALL LOCATIONS Order Now Rewards
